pizza hut complaints Comments (0) By admin , March 16, 2011 9:25 pm pizza hut complaints
related to web 1. Pizza Hut –America\’s Favorite Pizza –Terms of Use We at Pizza Hut would love to hear from you! Now you can send us your feedback online with no waiting.…Get Pizza Hut coupons, specials, promotions, announcements and event information from Pizza Hut delivered to your email address or phone. http://www.pizzahut.com/contactus/contactlanding.aspx
2. Pizza Hut goes VoIP In fact, this source informed me that Pizza Hut has deployed hosted VoIP along with hosted agents to answer incoming pizza orders for local chains. (How widespread or how many chains is unknown) One advantage is the cost-savings of canceling almost all…Unresolved Customer Complaints Can Affect the Whole IP Communications… http://blog.tmcnet.com/blog/tom-keating/voip/pizza-hut-goes-voip.asp
